mapper.select: select id, item_name, item_value from alarm_color_list_vw
select id, abbr, message from alarm_message order by abbr
select at.id, at.priority, at.code, at.alarm_msg_id, at.id, am.message from alarm_type at join alarm_message am on at.alarm_msg_id=am.id order by at.code
select id, priority, alarm_msg_id, code from alarm_type
select id, alarm_type_id, tag_type_id, alm_occurred , acknowledged, active, alarm_msg_id from alarm order by alm_occurred

select an.id, an.tag_id, an.alm_occurred, an.acknowledged, an.active , an.alarm_msg_id, an.priority, an.code, an.color, am.message , t.tag_type_code, t.name, t.description, an.value from alarm_info an join alarm_message am on an.alarm_msg_id = am.id join tag t on an.tag_id = t.id order by an.priority desc, an.alm_occurred desc

select a.id, alarm_type_id, tag_type_id, at.code, a.tag_id, a.alm_occurred , a.acknowledged, a.active, a.alarm_msg_id, am.message from alarm a join alarm_type at on a.alarm_type_id = at.id join alarm_message am on a.alarm_msg_id = am.id where a.tag_id = #{param1} and a.active = 'Y' order by abbr
mapper.insert: insert alarm_type( code, priority, alarm_msg_id ) values (#{code}, #{priority}, #{alarmMsgId})
